card.title: Mission Statement
card.body: At Cupidy our mission is to bring people together to form genuine and lasting relationships. Whether you're searching for love, companionship, or friendship, Cupidy is the platform that helps you find your perfect match.

body.creatbody: - a safe and welcoming space for users to meet and interact.
body.utilizebody: - cutting-edge technology to provide accurate and meaningful matches.

body.offerbody: - a variety of interactive features to enhance the user experience.
body.fosterbody: - a community where users can connect and grow together.

features.text1: Smart Matching Algorithm: Our advanced algorithm matches you with users who share your interests and values.
features.text2: Secure Chat: Private messaging to help you get to know your matches better.
features.text3: Customizable Profiles: Showcase your personality and preferences.
features.text4: Advanced Search Filters: Find potential matches based on location, age, interests, and more.

howItWork.title: Signup:
howItWork.text: Create an account quickly using your email or social media.

howItWork.title: Build Your Profile:
howItWork.text: Add details about yourself and what you're looking for.

howItWork.title: Sign Up:
howItWork.text: Create an account quickly using your email or social media.

howItWork.title: Find Matches:
howItWork.text: Browse profiles and use our matching algorithm to find the best matches.

planning.description: We follow the Agile development model, which allows us to continuously improve and quickly deliver new features. Our development is divided into four iterations:

firstIteration.step1: Implement Login, Sign-in, and Sign-up functionalities.
firstIteration.step2: Collect user data and create user profiles.
firstIteration.step3: Develop matching algorithms to connect users based on their preferences.

secondIteration.step1: Create the Admin Dashboard for better management.
secondIteration.step2: Implement other mini features to enhance user experience.

thirdIteration.step1: Develop the Chatting Workspace to enable users to communicate with each other.

safetlyTips.title: Safety Tips
safetlyTips.tip1: Do not share personal information like your home address or financial details.
safetlyTips.tip2: Always meet in public places for your initial dates.
safetlyTips.tip3: Trust your instincts and report any suspicious behavior.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.text1: At Cupidy, your privacy is our priority. We are committed to safeguarding your personal data.
privacy.link: Read our full Privacy Policy here.

question1.question: How do I create an account?
question1.answer: Sign up with your email and follow the prompts to build your profile.

question2.question: Is Cupidy free to use?
question2.answer: Yes, Cupidy offers basic features for free. Premium features are available through subscription plans.

question3.question: How can I report a user?
question3.answer: For now, use the email from contact page or contact our support team.

question4.question: What if I forget my password?
question4.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions to reset it.

mainDashboard.title: Main Dashboard
mainDashboard.description: The central hub for your activities, offering a quick overview of your account, latest updates, and personalized insights.

messagingCenter.title: Messaging Center
messagingCenter.description: Connect with others in real-time, exchange messages, and stay in touch with your connections seamlessly.

aboutPlatform.title: About Our Platform
aboutPlatform.description: Learn more about our mission, values, and the team that’s dedicated to providing the best experience for you.

yourProfile.title: Your Profile
yourProfile.description: View and share your personal information, preferences, and account settings to tailor your experience.

setting.title: Setting
setting.description: You can adjust the theme color & toggle the language between English and Burmese. You can also logout account.

personalityType.title: Personality Type
personalityType.description: Explore and identify personality types that align with your traits, helping you connect with like-minded individuals.

findMatch.title: Find Your Match
findMatch.description: Discover potential matches based on your preferences and interests, and take the first step towards meaningful connections.

totalLikes.title: Total Likes Received
totalLikes.description: Track the number of likes you’ve received from others, a quick indicator of your profile’s popularity.

profilePhoto.title: Profile Information
profilePhoto.description: Manage your profile picture and other key details that represent your online persona. Keep it updated to reflect your best self.

qrCode.title: QR Code for Sharing
qrCode.description: Easily share your profile with others by scanning or sharing this QR code, enabling quick connections.

detailedInfo.title: Detailed Information
detailedInfo.description: View and update your location, interests, and birth date to make your profile more personalized and informative.

userPosts.title: User Posts
userPosts.description: Browse through your posted images and content. Keep your followers engaged by sharing updates regularly.

languageSettings.title: Language Settings
languageSettings.description: Easily switch between English and Burmese to navigate the app in your preferred language.

themeSelection.title: Theme Selection
themeSelection.description: Customize your app experience by choosing from four main color themes. Pick the one that suits your style best.

signOut.title: Sign Out
signOut.description: Click here to securely log out of your account and end your session.
